String.Source: Bane Uses Power of Soul Rending!
String.Dest: Bane Uses Power of Soul Rending!

String.Source: Blade Comes to the Aid of His Brother!
String.Dest: Blade Comes to the Aid of His Brother!

String.Source: Burning Inferno Arrives to Aid Bane!
String.Dest: Burning Inferno Arrives to Aid Bane!

String.Source: The Silver Armor is Blessed... You are Burning!!!
String.Dest: 銀の鎧は祝福されている... 身体が燃える！！！
